title: Logging onto chat service...
body:
I always get this message and don't even get a manual reconnect button.
I tried to restart my pc and also the game for like 3 times now and nothing.

replies.body:
There may be a number of things preventing your connection to the chat service from happening. A lot of the time, local network settings are conflicting with League and require some changes to be made. I suggest taking a look at the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as you begin troubleshooting this issue.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your ability to connect.
